LanguageData.AB_BrighterCragsDescription: Makes the Forsaken Crags quite brighter, for those with a PC screen that makes the Crags WAY too dark. This change takes effect on the next weather change on the map, or on savegame reload.
LanguageData.AB_TerrainCannotSupport_Propane: The pump needs to be built on a solid propane ground
LanguageData.AB_OcularForestOnly: This device will only work in an ocular forest
LanguageData.AB_AlphaAnimalsNotInstalled: Since Alpha Animals is not installed, this hive is inactive
LanguageData.AB_MustPlaceOnTarPit: The pump must be built on top of tarred mud or a tar hole
LanguageData.AB_WarningLowEfficiency: Pump acting in low efficiency mode due to absence of Tar Hole
LanguageData.AB_NotReallyAPlant: This is just a disgusting puddle of smelly tar
LanguageData.AB_ChooseMineDesc: Choose chunk type to drill. You can choose any of the base game rock types, or random
LanguageData.AB_MultiplierTooltip: This multiplier will affect the spawn changes (commonality) of the {0} when creating a world. Bear in mind that commonalities in biomes are not linear, so you will have to experiment and tweak until you get a biome density that suits your needs. Bear in mind too that this could be affected by other mods that either add new biomes or modify the way the game creates a world.
